recipes.name: Avocado Toast
recipes.description: Whole grain toast topped with mashed avocado, cherry tomatoes, and a poached egg.

recipes.name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
recipes.description: Creamy Greek yogurt layered with crunchy granola, fresh mixed berries, and a drizzle of honey for natural sweetness.

recipes.name: Mediterranean Bowl
recipes.description: Brown rice bowl with grilled chicken, hummus, cucumber, tomatoes, and feta cheese.

recipes.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
recipes.description: Romaine lettuce with grilled chicken, parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

recipes.name: Grilled Salmon
recipes.description: Grilled salmon fillet seasoned with herbs and lemon, served with roasted asparagus and sweet potato wedges.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.description: Colorful vegetable stir fry featuring crisp broccoli, carrots, snap peas, and bell peppers, with pan-seared tofu cubes served over fluffy brown rice and drizzled with a savory ginger-soy sauce.

recipes.name: Beef and Broccoli
recipes.description: Tender beef strips with broccoli in a savory sauce, served with brown rice.

recipes.name: Quinoa Salad Bowl
recipes.description: A protein-rich quinoa bowl featuring fluffy quinoa, tender grilled chicken breast, and a colorful medley of roasted seasonal vegetables including sweet bell peppers, zucchini, and cherry tomatoes, topped with fresh herbs and a light lemon vinaigrette.

recipes.name: Turkey Wrap
recipes.description: Whole wheat wrap filled with sliced turkey breast, creamy avocado, crisp lettuce, juicy tomatoes, crunchy cucumbers, and red onions, drizzled with a light herb-infused yogurt dressing.
